content.description: “The whole history of society up to now has been the history of class struggles. Our period, however, the bourgeois period, is distinguished by the fact that it has simplified class antagonisms. All society is splitting more and more into two great hostile camps, into two large classes opposing each other directly: bourgeoisie and proletariat.”
content.question: Which of the following wrote the passage above?

choices.label: Prince von Metternich and Viscount Castlereagh
John Stuart Mill and Harriet Taylor
